text: Urfi Javed (Uorfi Javed) is an Indian television actress. She is known for portraying the role of Avni in Bade Bhaiyaa Ki Dulhaniya, Aarti in Meri Durga and Bella in Bepanaah. == Early life == She was in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh. Urfi did her schooling from City Montessori School and then did her graduation in Mass Communication from Amity University. She was working as a fashion designer's assistant in Delhi and then moved to Mumbai. == Career == In 2016, Javed appeared in Sony TV's Bade Bhaiya Ki Dulhania as Avni Pant. In the same year, she played the role of Chhaya on StarPlus's Chandra Nandini. In 2017, she played the role of Aarti in Star Plus's Meri Durga. In 2018, she was seen in SAB TV's Saat Phero Ki Hera Pheri and in Colors TV's Bepanaah. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Lucknow
title: Urfi Javed
